metadata.name: SM0001-2/3-Walker
metadata.description:
Future ATV/ A non-military version of a popular film franchise two-legged vehicle. Guache airbrush online and washboard. Zero digital tools used in its creation, other than a scan.

This is a two-part piece of art. The first part as above. The second part, a reimagined piece by thesame artist, 30 years later 100% digital. On competition of Auction, you get a high-res scan of the original + entitles you to the second piece - airdropped shortly after, the re-imagined art currently in development now, 20+ years later. same boyish charm + the wisdom of the ages.

You'll get to see and influence me to create something in the digi-real space that we are now in.

ScarabMajor's original school art from the late 1900s (1992). 3x art pieces piece for this project (Scarabmajor-0001). The first two pieces are scanned from the original 90's art. The third is to be chosen by the community from a selection of past works. 1st of many projects.
